_sText:
Do not watch the video if you don't wish to spoil the map! Refer to it as a helper if you are stuck.


This map tests your knowledge of Source engine with 15 small obstacles ranging from common knowledge to niche. Each obstacle must be completed by one person at a time. Sometimes bugs are the intended solution. Can you beat them all?

Server requirements: 100 tick, no stamina (autobhop settings), DISABLE RNGFIX OR SURFFIX PLUGINS!
